channel.title: Someone is spamming and nulling my server anyone help?
channel.description: when i look in client the andthing with the name syi in is is auto ban and anything with the name null in it is auto ban but still hes nulling any help?

item.title: Someone is spamming and nulling my server anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

There are tutorials on this,
Also, You can make it so you can only log on 1 account from the ip address.
